title: Stocks to Watch--And Bonds, Too: What's Ahead for the Markets
description: Barron's Senior Managing Editor Lauren R. Rublin speaks with Deputy Editor Ben Levisohn and Ashok K. Bhatia, deputy chief investment officer for fixed income at Neuberger Berman, about the outlook for financial markets, sectors, individual stocks, and opportunities in fixed income.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
